Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.norconex.collector.http.link.impl.GenericLinkExtractor
    Since 3.0.0, use HtmlLinkExtractor or DOMLinkExtractor instead.
    com.norconex.collector.http.fetch.impl.PhantomJSDocumentFetcher
    Since 3.0.0 use WebDriverHttpFetcher
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.norconex.collector.http.checksum.impl.LastModifiedMetadataChecksummer.isDisabled()
    Since 2.0.0, not having a checksummer defined or setting one explicitly to null effectively disables it.
    com.norconex.collector.http.crawler.HttpCrawlerConfig.isFetchHttpHead()
    Use HttpCrawlerConfig.getFetchHttpHead().
    com.norconex.collector.http.crawler.HttpCrawlerConfig.isKeepOutOfScopeLinks()
    Since 3.0.0, use HttpCrawlerConfig.getKeepReferencedLinks().
    com.norconex.collector.http.checksum.impl.LastModifiedMetadataChecksummer.setDisabled(boolean)
    Since 2.0.0, not having a checksummer defined or setting one explicitly to null effectively disable it.
    com.norconex.collector.http.crawler.HttpCrawlerConfig.setFetchHttpHead(boolean)
    Use HttpCrawlerConfig.setFetchHttpHead(HttpMethodSupport).
    com.norconex.collector.http.crawler.HttpCrawlerConfig.setKeepOutOfScopeLinks(boolean)
    Since 3.0.0, use HttpCrawlerConfig.setKeepReferencedLinks(Set).
